page.title: 01General Review of E.Cldr./Kn
page.content: East Calder and Kirknewton area is in the Central Lowlands of Scotland 19 km west of Edinburgh and 5km east of Livingston New Town. It is in the West Lothian district of Lothian Region. East Calder(66HA),the larger of the two residential areas,is situated on the A71.There is little industry today in the area.The population is growing because of the convenience of routes east and west(A71,M8),north and south (M9,M90,A70).Private housing has grown as houses are cheaper to buy than in Edinburgh. Kirknewton(22HA),lies to the east of the block,on the railway line from Glasgow to Edinburgh. The surrounding area is mostly dairy farmland with some small holdings, poultry farms and piggeries.In the the north west of the block is the Almondell Country Park on the R/Almond
